content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260812,"originalJapaneseLine":"もうそっちに夢中な感じ・・あいかわらずだなと","translatedEnglishLine":"You seem totally absorbed over there... just like always."},{"lineNumber":260813,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイがランスが留守中に現れたと情報が入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Information comes in that the demon Ray appeared while Rance was away."},{"lineNumber":260814,"originalJapaneseLine":"いないと思ってちょっと留守にしすぎたか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought he wasn't here, but maybe I was away a bit too long..."},{"lineNumber":260815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260816,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに報告が入る","translatedEnglishLine":"A report comes in then."},{"lineNumber":260817,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイの率いる部隊が現れました。数は１万ほど","translatedEnglishLine":"A unit led by demon Ray has appeared. Their number is about 10,000."},{"lineNumber":260818,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルの方面です。それほど多くないな","translatedEnglishLine":"They are heading toward Hyperville. Not too many, huh."},{"lineNumber":260819,"originalJapaneseLine":"自衛隊を出撃させますかとコパンドンが言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon asks if we should deploy the self-defense force,"},{"lineNumber":260820,"originalJapaneseLine":"必要無い、余計な奴らがいたら邪魔だ、俺の部隊だけで始末する","translatedEnglishLine":"No need. If unnecessary people get involved, they'll just be a hindrance. I'll deal with it with my own unit."},{"lineNumber":260821,"originalJapaneseLine":"出撃","translatedEnglishLine":"Deploy."},{"lineNumber":260822,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図：自由都市１／合戦１１\t\t現在値","translatedEnglishLine":"Map: Free City 1 / Battle 11\t\tCurrent position."},{"lineNumber":260823,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がハイパービル前に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group arrived before Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260824,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、まだ魔軍と自由都市軍は戦闘になっていなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the demon army and Free City forces had not yet engaged in battle."},{"lineNumber":260825,"originalJapaneseLine":"両軍はハイパービル前面に広がる巨大な平原を前に向き合ったままだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Both armies stood facing each other across the vast plain stretching before Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260826,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ・・これは　平原は穴だらけだった","translatedEnglishLine":"What... is this? The plain was riddled with holes."},{"lineNumber":260827,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに近くに展開していた自由都市軍３千のリーダーが話かけてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soon, the leader of the 3,000 Free City soldiers deployed nearby approached and spoke."},{"lineNumber":260828,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら２．３日前にこのあたりで　モグラミミズ　が現れたのに違い無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, two or three days ago, 'Moguramimizu' appeared in this area."},{"lineNumber":260829,"originalJapaneseLine":"大型モンスターである彼らが暴れると大地は巨大な穴だからけ、地下も洞窟だらけになり","translatedEnglishLine":"When these large monsters rampage, the ground becomes full of huge holes, and underground is filled with caves."},{"lineNumber":260830,"originalJapaneseLine":"整地しないととても歩ける場所でなくなりますうんぬん、戦い所では無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's not leveled, it becomes impossible to walk there, stuff like that, so this isn't a place for battle."},{"lineNumber":260831,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍もこれでは動けないでしょう","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army probably can't move in this either."},{"lineNumber":260832,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・・チャンスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... this is a chance."},{"lineNumber":260833,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達は我々との戦いは無いとみているわけだな、よし、俺はあえて突っ込む","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters must be thinking there won't be a fight with us. Alright, I'll boldly charge in."},{"lineNumber":260834,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ・・この穴だらけの平原をですか・・危険ですよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh... charge through this hole-riddled plain...? That's dangerous..."},{"lineNumber":260835,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":260836,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others advance across the hole-riddled plain..."},{"lineNumber":260837,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's position is still ahead."},{"lineNumber":260838,"originalJapaneseLine":"足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way..."},{"lineNumber":260839,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":260840,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫です、崩れないようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it seems it won't collapse."},{"lineNumber":260841,"originalJapaneseLine":"先に進みましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's move forward."},{"lineNumber":260842,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others continue advancing across the hole-riddled plain..."},{"lineNumber":260843,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's position is still ahead."},{"lineNumber":260844,"originalJapaneseLine":"足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way..."},{"lineNumber":260845,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・ //ここまで同じ文章","translatedEnglishLine":".... // Same text up to here."},{"lineNumber":260846,"originalJapaneseLine":"どさーーーん、地面が崩れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Crash! The ground collapsed."},{"lineNumber":260847,"originalJapaneseLine":"モグラネズミにより地底に掘られた空洞により地盤が弛んでいたようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground seemed weakened by cavities dug into the earth by mole rats."},{"lineNumber":260848,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわーーー　落ちていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa— we're falling down!"},{"lineNumber":260849,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービル前の魔軍野戦陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army's field camp in front of Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260850,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴ぼこだからけで戦えない、魔物兵もがっかり","translatedEnglishLine":"They can't fight because it's full of holes; the monster soldiers are disappointed."},{"lineNumber":260851,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイ、つまらんな。俺だけでも突っ込んでいって人間部隊と戦うか","translatedEnglishLine":"Ray, this is boring. Maybe I'll just charge in alone and fight the human troops."},{"lineNumber":260852,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前らここで待っていろとか言っていたら","translatedEnglishLine":"If I told you guys to just wait here..."},{"lineNumber":260853,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告、魔剣カオスを持つ人間がいる特殊部隊、それがこの穴だからけの平原を","translatedEnglishLine":"Report: A special unit with a human wielding the magic sword Chaos is crossing this hole-riddled plain."},{"lineNumber":260854,"originalJapaneseLine":"突っ切ってこちらに向かっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are charging straight toward us."},{"lineNumber":260855,"originalJapaneseLine":"おー、やるなと　うれしくなるレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, impressive, says Ray happily."},{"lineNumber":260856,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：自由都市平原","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Free City Plain."},{"lineNumber":260857,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴草原を突破した、目の前にそびえ立つハイパービル","translatedEnglishLine":"Having broken through the hole-filled grassland, Hyperville towers before them."},{"lineNumber":260858,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして数百メートル先に１万に登る魔軍が待ち構えていた","translatedEnglishLine":"And several hundred meters ahead, 10,000 demon soldiers waited poised."},{"lineNumber":260859,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか穴ぼこ地帯を突破したのはいいが・・１万からの魔軍が居るんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"They managed to break through the hole-riddled area, but there's 10,000 demon soldiers there."},{"lineNumber":260860,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつもみたいに裏をまわって奇襲とかしている暇はないぞ、完全に察知されているはずだ","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no time to flank and surprise attack like usual; they must be fully aware."},{"lineNumber":260861,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら正攻法で叩くのみ、１回の戦闘で２００体ぐらい倒せば・・ざっと","translatedEnglishLine":"Then we must beat them head-on. If we can defeat about 200 enemies per battle... roughly..."},{"lineNumber":260862,"originalJapaneseLine":"５０回戦闘すれば１万倒せます、ランス様","translatedEnglishLine":"After about 50 battles, we can defeat 10,000, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":260863,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう５０回・・えっ、５０回・・マジか","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, 50 times... huh, 50 times... seriously?"},{"lineNumber":260864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260865,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、偵察機が現れた。レイが正々堂々と勝負するといってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, a scout plane appeared. Ray said he wanted a fair fight."},{"lineNumber":260866,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは都合がいいとランスはその誘いに乗る","translatedEnglishLine":"That works out well, so Rance accepts the challenge."},{"lineNumber":260867,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルの周辺","translatedEnglishLine":"Around Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260868,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍１万の部隊を発見した。数が多いな。それに密集している","translatedEnglishLine":"Discovered a demon army unit of 10,000. Quite a number. And they're densely packed."},{"lineNumber":260869,"originalJapaneseLine":"めんどくさいな、これでは魔人に近づけないじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"What a hassle. With this, we can't get close to the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":260870,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、居るぞ・・あの魔物の大軍の中に魔人レイが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, there he is... demon Ray is among that huge monster army."},{"lineNumber":260871,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、露払いに自由都市の軍隊を突っ込ませたらよかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, it would have been better to send in the Free City troops as a vanguard."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうそっちに夢中な感じ・・あいかわらずだなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You seem totally absorbed over there... just like always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイがランスが留守中に現れたと情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information comes in that the demon Ray appeared while Rance was away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いないと思ってちょっと留守にしすぎたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought he wasn't here, but maybe I was away a bit too long...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report comes in then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイの率いる部隊が現れました。数は１万ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit led by demon Ray has appeared. Their number is about 10,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの方面です。それほど多くないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are heading toward Hyperville. Not too many, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自衛隊を出撃させますかとコパンドンが言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon asks if we should deploy the self-defense force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要無い、余計な奴らがいたら邪魔だ、俺の部隊だけで始末する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need. If unnecessary people get involved, they'll just be a hindrance. I'll deal with it with my own unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deploy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：自由都市１／合戦１１		現在値
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Free City 1 / Battle 11		Current position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がハイパービル前に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group arrived before Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、まだ魔軍と自由都市軍は戦闘になっていなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the demon army and Free City forces had not yet engaged in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍はハイパービル前面に広がる巨大な平原を前に向き合ったままだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both armies stood facing each other across the vast plain stretching before Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・これは　平原は穴だらけだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this? The plain was riddled with holes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに近くに展開していた自由都市軍３千のリーダーが話かけてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, the leader of the 3,000 Free City soldiers deployed nearby approached and spoke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら２．３日前にこのあたりで　モグラミミズ　が現れたのに違い無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, two or three days ago, 'Moguramimizu' appeared in this area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型モンスターである彼らが暴れると大地は巨大な穴だからけ、地下も洞窟だらけになり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When these large monsters rampage, the ground becomes full of huge holes, and underground is filled with caves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 整地しないととても歩ける場所でなくなりますうんぬん、戦い所では無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's not leveled, it becomes impossible to walk there, stuff like that, so this isn't a place for battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍もこれでは動けないでしょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army probably can't move in this either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・・チャンスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... this is a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は我々との戦いは無いとみているわけだな、よし、俺はあえて突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters must be thinking there won't be a fight with us. Alright, I'll boldly charge in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・この穴だらけの平原をですか・・危険ですよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... charge through this hole-riddled plain...? That's dangerous...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance across the hole-riddled plain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's position is still ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫です、崩れないようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, it seems it won't collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に進みましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others continue advancing across the hole-riddled plain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's position is still ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・ //ここまで同じ文章
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: .... // Same text up to here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさーーーん、地面が崩れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crash! The ground collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モグラネズミにより地底に掘られた空洞により地盤が弛んでいたようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground seemed weakened by cavities dug into the earth by mole rats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわーーー　落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa— we're falling down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービル前の魔軍野戦陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army's field camp in front of Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴ぼこだからけで戦えない、魔物兵もがっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They can't fight because it's full of holes; the monster soldiers are disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ、つまらんな。俺だけでも突っ込んでいって人間部隊と戦うか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray, this is boring. Maybe I'll just charge in alone and fight the human troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らここで待っていろとか言っていたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I told you guys to just wait here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告、魔剣カオスを持つ人間がいる特殊部隊、それがこの穴だからけの平原を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: A special unit with a human wielding the magic sword Chaos is crossing this hole-riddled plain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突っ切ってこちらに向かっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are charging straight toward us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おー、やるなと　うれしくなるレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, impressive, says Ray happily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：自由都市平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Free City Plain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴草原を突破した、目の前にそびえ立つハイパービル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having broken through the hole-filled grassland, Hyperville towers before them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして数百メートル先に１万に登る魔軍が待ち構えていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And several hundred meters ahead, 10,000 demon soldiers waited poised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか穴ぼこ地帯を突破したのはいいが・・１万からの魔軍が居るんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They managed to break through the hole-riddled area, but there's 10,000 demon soldiers there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもみたいに裏をまわって奇襲とかしている暇はないぞ、完全に察知されているはずだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no time to flank and surprise attack like usual; they must be fully aware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら正攻法で叩くのみ、１回の戦闘で２００体ぐらい倒せば・・ざっと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we must beat them head-on. If we can defeat about 200 enemies per battle... roughly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５０回戦闘すれば１万倒せます、ランス様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After about 50 battles, we can defeat 10,000, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう５０回・・えっ、５０回・・マジか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, 50 times... huh, 50 times... seriously?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、偵察機が現れた。レイが正々堂々と勝負するといってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, a scout plane appeared. Ray said he wanted a fair fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは都合がいいとランスはその誘いに乗る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That works out well, so Rance accepts the challenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍１万の部隊を発見した。数が多いな。それに密集している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered a demon army unit of 10,000. Quite a number. And they're densely packed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めんどくさいな、これでは魔人に近づけないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a hassle. With this, we can't get close to the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、居るぞ・・あの魔物の大軍の中に魔人レイが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, there he is... demon Ray is among that huge monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、露払いに自由都市の軍隊を突っ込ませたらよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, it would have been better to send in the Free City troops as a vanguard.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

The plain was riddled with holes."},{"lineNumber":260827,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに近くに展開していた自由都市軍３千のリーダーが話かけてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soon, the leader of the 3,000 Free City soldiers deployed nearby approached and spoke."},{"lineNumber":260828,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら２．３日前にこのあたりで　モグラミミズ　が現れたのに違い無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, two or three days ago, 'Moguramimizu' appeared in this area."},{"lineNumber":260829,"originalJapaneseLine":"大型モンスターである彼らが暴れると大地は巨大な穴だからけ、地下も洞窟だらけになり","translatedEnglishLine":"When these large monsters rampage, the ground becomes full of huge holes, and underground is filled with caves."},{"lineNumber":260830,"originalJapaneseLine":"整地しないととても歩ける場所でなくなりますうんぬん、戦い所では無いです","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's not leveled, it becomes impossible to walk there, stuff like that, so this isn't a place for battle."},{"lineNumber":260831,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍もこれでは動けないでしょう","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army probably can't move in this either."},{"lineNumber":260832,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・・チャンスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... this is a chance."},{"lineNumber":260833,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達は我々との戦いは無いとみているわけだな、よし、俺はあえて突っ込む","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters must be thinking there won't be a fight with us. Alright, I'll boldly charge in."},{"lineNumber":260834,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ・・この穴だらけの平原をですか・・危険ですよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh... charge through this hole-riddled plain...? That's dangerous..."},{"lineNumber":260835,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":260836,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others advance across the hole-riddled plain..."},{"lineNumber":260837,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's position is still ahead."},{"lineNumber":260838,"originalJapaneseLine":"足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way..."},{"lineNumber":260839,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":260840,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫です、崩れないようです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it seems it won't collapse."},{"lineNumber":260841,"originalJapaneseLine":"先に進みましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's move forward."},{"lineNumber":260842,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others continue advancing across the hole-riddled plain..."},{"lineNumber":260843,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's position is still ahead."},{"lineNumber":260844,"originalJapaneseLine":"足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way..."},{"lineNumber":260845,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・ //ここまで同じ文章","translatedEnglishLine":".... // Same text up to here."},{"lineNumber":260846,"originalJapaneseLine":"どさーーーん、地面が崩れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Crash! The ground collapsed."},{"lineNumber":260847,"originalJapaneseLine":"モグラネズミにより地底に掘られた空洞により地盤が弛んでいたようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground seemed weakened by cavities dug into the earth by mole rats."},{"lineNumber":260848,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわーーー　落ちていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa— we're falling down!"},{"lineNumber":260849,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービル前の魔軍野戦陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army's field camp in front of Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260850,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴ぼこだからけで戦えない、魔物兵もがっかり","translatedEnglishLine":"They can't fight because it's full of holes; the monster soldiers are disappointed."},{"lineNumber":260851,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイ、つまらんな。俺だけでも突っ込んでいって人間部隊と戦うか","translatedEnglishLine":"Ray, this is boring. Maybe I'll just charge in alone and fight the human troops."},{"lineNumber":260852,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前らここで待っていろとか言っていたら","translatedEnglishLine":"If I told you guys to just wait here..."},{"lineNumber":260853,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告、魔剣カオスを持つ人間がいる特殊部隊、それがこの穴だからけの平原を","translatedEnglishLine":"Report: A special unit with a human wielding the magic sword Chaos is crossing this hole-riddled plain."},{"lineNumber":260854,"originalJapaneseLine":"突っ切ってこちらに向かっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are charging straight toward us."},{"lineNumber":260855,"originalJapaneseLine":"おー、やるなと　うれしくなるレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, impressive, says Ray happily."},{"lineNumber":260856,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：自由都市平原","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Free City Plain."},{"lineNumber":260857,"originalJapaneseLine":"穴草原を突破した、目の前にそびえ立つハイパービル","translatedEnglishLine":"Having broken through the hole-filled grassland, Hyperville towers before them."},{"lineNumber":260858,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして数百メートル先に１万に登る魔軍が待ち構えていた","translatedEnglishLine":"And several hundred meters ahead, 10,000 demon soldiers waited poised."},{"lineNumber":260859,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか穴ぼこ地帯を突破したのはいいが・・１万からの魔軍が居るんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"They managed to break through the hole-riddled area, but there's 10,000 demon soldiers there."},{"lineNumber":260860,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつもみたいに裏をまわって奇襲とかしている暇はないぞ、完全に察知されているはずだ","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no time to flank and surprise attack like usual; they must be fully aware."},{"lineNumber":260861,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら正攻法で叩くのみ、１回の戦闘で２００体ぐらい倒せば・・ざっと","translatedEnglishLine":"Then we must beat them head-on. If we can defeat about 200 enemies per battle... roughly..."},{"lineNumber":260862,"originalJapaneseLine":"５０回戦闘すれば１万倒せます、ランス様","translatedEnglishLine":"After about 50 battles, we can defeat 10,000, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":260863,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう５０回・・えっ、５０回・・マジか","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, 50 times... huh, 50 times... seriously?"},{"lineNumber":260864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260865,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、偵察機が現れた。レイが正々堂々と勝負するといってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, a scout plane appeared. Ray said he wanted a fair fight."},{"lineNumber":260866,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは都合がいいとランスはその誘いに乗る","translatedEnglishLine":"That works out well, so Rance accepts the challenge."},{"lineNumber":260867,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルの周辺","translatedEnglishLine":"Around Hyperville."},{"lineNumber":260868,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍１万の部隊を発見した。数が多いな。それに密集している","translatedEnglishLine":"Discovered a demon army unit of 10,000. Quite a number. And they're densely packed."},{"lineNumber":260869,"originalJapaneseLine":"めんどくさいな、これでは魔人に近づけないじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"What a hassle. With this, we can't get close to the demon lord."},{"lineNumber":260870,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、居るぞ・・あの魔物の大軍の中に魔人レイが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, there he is... demon Ray is among that huge monster army."},{"lineNumber":260871,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、露払いに自由都市の軍隊を突っ込ませたらよかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, it would have been better to send in the Free City troops as a vanguard."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうそっちに夢中な感じ・・あいかわらずだなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You seem totally absorbed over there... just like always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイがランスが留守中に現れたと情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information comes in that the demon Ray appeared while Rance was away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いないと思ってちょっと留守にしすぎたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought he wasn't here, but maybe I was away a bit too long...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report comes in then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイの率いる部隊が現れました。数は１万ほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit led by demon Ray has appeared. Their number is about 10,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの方面です。それほど多くないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are heading toward Hyperville. Not too many, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自衛隊を出撃させますかとコパンドンが言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon asks if we should deploy the self-defense force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要無い、余計な奴らがいたら邪魔だ、俺の部隊だけで始末する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need. If unnecessary people get involved, they'll just be a hindrance. I'll deal with it with my own unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deploy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：自由都市１／合戦１１		現在値
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Free City 1 / Battle 11		Current position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がハイパービル前に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group arrived before Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、まだ魔軍と自由都市軍は戦闘になっていなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the demon army and Free City forces had not yet engaged in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両軍はハイパービル前面に広がる巨大な平原を前に向き合ったままだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both armies stood facing each other across the vast plain stretching before Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・これは　平原は穴だらけだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this? The plain was riddled with holes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに近くに展開していた自由都市軍３千のリーダーが話かけてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, the leader of the 3,000 Free City soldiers deployed nearby approached and spoke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら２．３日前にこのあたりで　モグラミミズ　が現れたのに違い無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, two or three days ago, 'Moguramimizu' appeared in this area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型モンスターである彼らが暴れると大地は巨大な穴だからけ、地下も洞窟だらけになり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When these large monsters rampage, the ground becomes full of huge holes, and underground is filled with caves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 整地しないととても歩ける場所でなくなりますうんぬん、戦い所では無いです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's not leveled, it becomes impossible to walk there, stuff like that, so this isn't a place for battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍もこれでは動けないでしょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army probably can't move in this either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・・チャンスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... this is a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は我々との戦いは無いとみているわけだな、よし、俺はあえて突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters must be thinking there won't be a fight with us. Alright, I'll boldly charge in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・この穴だらけの平原をですか・・危険ですよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh... charge through this hole-riddled plain...? That's dangerous...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others advance across the hole-riddled plain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's position is still ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫です、崩れないようです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, it seems it won't collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に進みましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's move forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴だらけの平原を進むランス達・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others continue advancing across the hole-riddled plain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の陣地はまだ先だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's position is still ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足元がぐらっ・・　む・・まさか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath wobbled... hmm... no way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・ //ここまで同じ文章
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: .... // Same text up to here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさーーーん、地面が崩れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crash! The ground collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モグラネズミにより地底に掘られた空洞により地盤が弛んでいたようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground seemed weakened by cavities dug into the earth by mole rats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわーーー　落ちていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa— we're falling down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービル前の魔軍野戦陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army's field camp in front of Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴ぼこだからけで戦えない、魔物兵もがっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They can't fight because it's full of holes; the monster soldiers are disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ、つまらんな。俺だけでも突っ込んでいって人間部隊と戦うか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray, this is boring. Maybe I'll just charge in alone and fight the human troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らここで待っていろとか言っていたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I told you guys to just wait here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告、魔剣カオスを持つ人間がいる特殊部隊、それがこの穴だからけの平原を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: A special unit with a human wielding the magic sword Chaos is crossing this hole-riddled plain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突っ切ってこちらに向かっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are charging straight toward us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おー、やるなと　うれしくなるレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, impressive, says Ray happily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：自由都市平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Free City Plain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴草原を突破した、目の前にそびえ立つハイパービル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having broken through the hole-filled grassland, Hyperville towers before them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして数百メートル先に１万に登る魔軍が待ち構えていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And several hundred meters ahead, 10,000 demon soldiers waited poised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか穴ぼこ地帯を突破したのはいいが・・１万からの魔軍が居るんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They managed to break through the hole-riddled area, but there's 10,000 demon soldiers there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもみたいに裏をまわって奇襲とかしている暇はないぞ、完全に察知されているはずだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no time to flank and surprise attack like usual; they must be fully aware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら正攻法で叩くのみ、１回の戦闘で２００体ぐらい倒せば・・ざっと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we must beat them head-on. If we can defeat about 200 enemies per battle... roughly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５０回戦闘すれば１万倒せます、ランス様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After about 50 battles, we can defeat 10,000, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう５０回・・えっ、５０回・・マジか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, 50 times... huh, 50 times... seriously?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、偵察機が現れた。レイが正々堂々と勝負するといってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, a scout plane appeared. Ray said he wanted a fair fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは都合がいいとランスはその誘いに乗る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That works out well, so Rance accepts the challenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around Hyperville.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍１万の部隊を発見した。数が多いな。それに密集している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered a demon army unit of 10,000. Quite a number. And they're densely packed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: めんどくさいな、これでは魔人に近づけないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a hassle. With this, we can't get close to the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、居るぞ・・あの魔物の大軍の中に魔人レイが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, there he is... demon Ray is among that huge monster army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、露払いに自由都市の軍隊を突っ込ませたらよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, it would have been better to send in the Free City troops as a vanguard.
